channel.title: 🏢 Prescient/MLDD, Genentech Research and Early Development on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Prescient/MLDD, Genentech Research and Early Development on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Implicitly Guided Design with PropEn: Match your Data to Follow the Gradient
item.description: PropEn: a novel framework for implicitly guided design optimization that leverages ‘matching’ to boost efficiency by matching samples and approximating the gradient without a discriminator.
